typography.instructions: Import 'Cinzel' and 'Italiana' from Google Fonts in index.css. Use Cinzel for all major section headings to evoke Roman/Imperial authority.

layout.grid_system: Use a 12-column grid. For the Gallery, use a 'Masonry' or 'Museum Wall' layout (asymmetrical).
layout.spacing: Use generous spacing (py-24, py-32) between sections to create a museum-like atmosphere.
layout.containers: Max width 1400px for standard content, Full width for Hero and Immersive sections.

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-[#D4AF37] to-[#B8860B] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4 hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(212,175,55,0.3)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#D4AF37] text-[#D4AF37] uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4 hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-black transition-colors duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-[#F5F5F0] hover:text-[#D4AF37] uppercase tracking-widest text-sm transition-colors

cards.style: bg-[#0F0F0F]/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-[#D4AF37]/20 hover:border-[#D4AF37]/60 transition-all duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.hover_effect: Add a subtle inner glow or a 'shine' effect using a pseudo-element that moves across the card on hover.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-[#333] focus:border-[#D4AF37] text-[#F5F5F0] placeholder:text-[#555] rounded-none px-0 py-4 transition-colors focus:outline-none

textures.noise: Add a fixed position div with a noise texture image at 5% opacity over the entire app to give a 'film grain' or 'canvas' feel.
textures.marble: Use subtle marble textures in the background of specific sections (like the Footer or Auth pages).

ornaments.borders: Use double borders or 'corner accents' (L-shaped borders) on images to mimic picture frames.
ornaments.dividers: Use a central diamond or filigree icon in horizontal dividers.

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0 }} animate={{ opacity: 1 }} transition={{ duration: 1.2 }}
transitions.scroll_reveal: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 50 }} whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} viewport={{ once: true }} transition={{ duration: 0.8, ease: 'easeOut' }}

assets.icons: Use Lucide React with thin stroke width (1px or 1.5px) to maintain elegance.

phase_1_setup: Update tailwind.config.js with new colors (gold, obsidian) and fonts (Cinzel).
Add @import for Cinzel and Italiana in index.css.
phase_2_components: Redesign 'Button' component to match the Gold/Ghost styles.
phase_3_pages: LandingPage: Implement full-screen Hero with 'hero_bg' and parallax text.
GalleryPage: Implement Masonry grid with 'GoldCard' components.
ArtworkDetailPage: Use a split-screen layout (Image Left, Details Right) with 'sticky' details.
AuthPages: Use 'auth_bg' as a side panel image.

universal_guidelines: NEVER use default blue/purple shades. Stick to the Gold/Black/Grey palette.
Always use 'Cinzel' for H1 and H2 headings.
Ensure all interactive elements have a 'hover' state that involves a color shift to Gold.
Use 'backdrop-blur' heavily for overlays to maintain the 'Glass' aesthetic.
Dark mode is the ONLY mode. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless specifically requested (user said 'Dark theme preferred').
